February. Mr. Eric Schmidt has been Google's chief executive since July 2001, when he took over the role from Mr. Page and ushered the company through a public offering. Mr. Page said Eric Schmidt had done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. It is the same faith and credit that enables us to borrow from rich people and from China and from other countries. As you well know, in the history of this country, the United States has never defaulted on one penny owed to a creditor.
